poem:
**Against the Rise**

In the echo of voices,  
a tide of iron-clad fear —  
flags unfurl,  
and shadows stretch  
across the globe.

But beneath this clamor,  
in quiet corners —  
the soft whisper  
of common hands  
braids together a  
resilient new day.
